title: Portal: list MVP runs/jobs with filters (intent, mode, status)
scope: Add portal UX to list MVP runs across intents with filters for mode and status.
Support both local evidence runs (status/audit) and cloud job runs (GCS-backed references).
acceptance: Portal shows a run list with columns: intent_id, run_id, mode, status, timestamp.
Runs link to the intent page and to available artifacts.
Errors are actionable and do not expose arbitrary file read.

deliverables.title: Portal run list UI and data loader
acceptance: Run list page renders structured runs and supports filtering.
Loader reads from approved sources only (status/audit summaries).

subtasks.title: Implement run listing UI and safe loader.
done_when: runs/index.js exists and lists runs with filters.
runs.js loads summaries safely and deterministically.
